timeline.message:

timeline.bodyText:
If we're catching an exception, we either need to say why it is ignored, or do something with it; like get a stacktrace or send a debug logger message.
Additionally, this try-catch doesn't seem to throw anything and appears as if it can be omitted. If it does happen to throw something, the parent catch would be the first to find out.
